channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta Fined $843 Million by EU Over Marketplace Ads
item.description: The Facebook owner said it would appeal the fine imposed by the EU’s antitrust watchdog for allegations it illegally tied its Marketplace classified a...

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Spotify Takes Aim at YouTube in Battle for Podcasts
item.description: The audio streaming giant plans to pay hosts to make podcast videos and allow premium subscribers to watch them without ads.

item.title: Live updates: Trump sets stage for contentious confirmation battles with unexpected picks
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.

item.title: Durbin tells House ethics panel to preserve Gaetz report, records
There’s a Reason Harris’ Campaign Is Locked in on Quick Fixes
item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on ASML, Tencent and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Harris is pounding Trump on fascism. Some Dems think that’s a mistake.
item.description: Harris has ratcheted up her warnings about the dangers of a second Trump term in recent weeks.

item.title: Advanced Micro Devices to Cut Global Headcount by 4%
item.description: The layoffs would affect about 1,040 employees and are part of a shift in AMD’s broader business strategy.

item.title: It’s still the economy: What TV ads tell us about each campaign’s closing message
item.description: The final paid messages: Economy, culture wars and character.

item.title: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) will not run for chair of the Democratic National Committee,...
Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.
